text: The Lane Theater in Williamsburg, Kentucky, located at 508 Main St., is an Art Deco-style building which was built in 1948. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2004. The first-floor level of the facade "is covered in yellow and brown horizontal striped panels of enameled metal, accented with chrome"; the facade further above "is faced in vertical yellow and brown striped panels of enameled metal surrounding second floor glass block windows." title: Lane Theater
